channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Earnings Season to Test Investors' Faith in Big Tech Stocks
item.description: S&P 500 companies are expected to report the biggest quarterly profit jump since early 2022.

item.title: ‘I’m watching every last cent’: For July 4, my friend booked an Airbnb on Cape Cod — and said I’m welcome to visit. Should I offer to pay half?
item.description: “This vacation is already nearly breaking my budget.”

item.title: The Next Big Power Play on Wall Street
item.description: Hedge funds are fighting to win top traders of electricity and natural gas. But some question whether the outsize profits of recent years can be repea...

item.title: ‘Our loyalty isn’t worth anything’: I paid $70 for a seat with more legroom, but two women grabbed similar empty seats for free. Is that fair?
item.description: “I wrote to the airline to explain what had happened and asked for a refund of my miles.”

item.title: China's Foreign-Exchange Reserves Edged Down in June
‘She told my grandchildren lies about me so they would despise me’: I’m disinheriting my ungrateful daughter. Could she contest my will?
item.description: “I once complimented my daughter and her partner on a nice plant in their garage and they started laughing, and told me it was marijuana.”

item.title: The Credit-Card Feature That Saves Time, but Can Muck Up Your Bills
item.description: Customers run into problems when fraudulent charges keep popping up.

item.title: ‘He thinks I’m too materialistic’: My husband and I are in our 40s. He takes zero interest in our finances. He doesn’t even know the name of our mortgage company. What can I do?
item.description: “I am really worried that if I’m not around, he will not be able to manage the basics of everyday life for himself and our children.”

item.title: Kindred Spirits: How to Get Into Booze Collecting
item.description: Luxury bottles of Scotch and tequila are driving a boom in the spirits market, and you don’t need to be rich to get involved

item.title: ‘I’m appalled’: My grandfather co-signed his grandson’s student loan. After my grandfather died, my cousin skipped town. Will the estate have to pay the debt?
item.description: “The loan is now in default, and I have no idea where this grandson is.”
